General.Name: Beijing SPC Environment Protection Tech Co Ltd
General.Description: Beijing SPC Environment Protection Tech Co., Ltd. provides industrial water treatment, energy saving, and resource utilization services. It provides technical research and development, engineering design, construction, operation services, and capital investment. The company offers SPC single tower desulfurization and dedusting depth purification, dry flue gas purification, lignite-to-coke, flue gas denigration, SPC flue gas dehydration, and zero wastewater discharge technologies. It is also involved in industrial flue gas desulfurization, denitrification and dedusting treatment, energy conservation, comprehensive utilization, sewage treatment, and solid waste disposal activities. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Beijing, China.
